title: Amazing Aztecs
description: Want to Why the Aztecs like to eat scum?When the world is going to end?How to play a really violent ball game?Discover all the foul facts about the amazing Aztecs--all the gore and more!The Horrible Histories series has a proven track record of engaging even the most reluctant readers, and introducing them to fascinating times in the world's history by any means necessary! These crazy facts are enhanced by irreverent illustrations, comic strip storytelling, fun quizzes, and so much more!
author: Terry Deary
